title: All my Friends Have disapeared (Friends list)
body: I logged on and everything from my friends list was completely gone? Only thing there is left is the recently played.

replies.body: the same happened to me and while i was comenting in ur post they apeared again whitout even retarting the client

Hey I looked into this for you, and your friends list does look okay on our side.  There might be a connection issue failing to load up your info on pvp.net.  See if restarting your client might help.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case there's some instability or block.  Let me know if it helps!
